title: The Borgman: Last Battle (Sonic Soldier Borgman: Last Battle)
synopsis: It has been three years since the end of the series. Ryo works for NASA as an engineer on a large rocket project. Anise, fellow Borgman and lover, has been reduced to flipping burgers in a restaurant. So naturally, when she gets a letter offering her a professional job in a big, Japanese, high-tech project, she jumps at the chance. Ryo, however, is as indecisive as ever and so she leaves for Japan without him.
related_anime: ['Chouon Senshi Borgman 2: Shin Seiki 2058', 'Chouon Senshi Borgman: Lovers Rain']
